Posts.Content: It is greatly appreciated Sandy. Just want to start so I can close this chapter of my life.
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Sandy, That is why I write to you. I consider you my cancer buddy. You are helping me through this journey. Thank you so muchÂ  :)
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I did the same cleaned my house from top to bottom then of course it was the holidays. Now I wish I had the energy now that I had then. I could tell you over and over it will be alright but you have to be the one to realize that. I can say this, I never once felt sorry for myself I thought yea this sucks but I have to do what I have to do. Life is so short that you are the only one who can make it special so live and live and live
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Thank you Sandy. I am going in tomorrow for the porta cath,Tuesday starts chemo once a week for nine weeks then 3 weeks off and radiation for 7 weeks 5 days a week. So here's to prevention therapy. Just one more step forward.
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: As do I. Now that I am on this journey I hope to be as you and help as many as possible. I have been greatly educated in the last month.
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: That's what we are all here for, support. This board has helped me cope with this stuff we all shall overcome.
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: My bra really isnt a problem for me although after work and when I am home I take it off LOL. I now have the problem of a rash under my left breast I will speak with the doctor today before my treatment. I was doing very well until the PA mentioned it last week I think she jixed me LOL
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I found out today I will have 9 weeks of chemo, I am er/pr and HER2 positive. 3 months from now radiation will start it will be once a day 5 days a week for almost 7 weeks
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Had porta cath put in on Monday 1/27/14. Started chemo on Tuesday 1/28, I was in so much pain when they accessed my porta cath. It hurt so bad. I couldn't believe they used it less than 24 hrs after surgery, wow the pain. Feeling a little nausea a today
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Nay Nay, Had mine done Dec 18th really is no big deal you can not feel anything I actually watched on the screen and thought the whole thing was pretty neat to watch. I had my Lumpectomy with sentinal node dissection on Jan 6th. I am on my 9th radiation treatment finish Chemo on the 24th of April and go every third week for Herceptin. Believe me it is all in your attitude. I feel fine just tired but I will tell you this something I am still trying to follow, it is about you no one but you. Do what you need to do to heal. I am here to help you through anyway I can Good Luck Millie
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I just had a lumpectomy with sentinel node dissection on Monday January 6th. The hospital sent me home with a sports like bra,I found this to be very comfortable. Today Wednesday I took my shower and washed the hospital bra. While waiting for it to dry I wore my normal underwire bra. Was not comfortable at all.
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Very good advice thank you Sandy. I met the radiologist today and tomorrow I will find out if I need chemo also. I am HER2 + so I was told more than likely Chemo also. How much radiation did you receive?
